amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: None of the funds in this Act may be used for the Conte Anadromous Fish Laboratory.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used for the Conte Anadromous Fish Laboratory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 330 (Roll no. 566).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Campbell (CA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Campbell (CA) amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 330 (Roll no. 566).
